channel.title: Comments on: Epics for Tigole’s Mom!

item.title: By: Belittle
item.dc:creator: Belittle
item.description: Wow. Random Poster is an idiot. Guys, this blog was posted before TBC. I thought casuals were actually happy now with the heroics, the 10 mans, the 25 mans, the daily quests, and arena only requiring 10 games a week.
item.content:encoded: Wow. Random Poster is an idiot. Guys, this blog was posted before TBC. I thought casuals were actually happy now with the heroics, the 10 mans, the 25 mans, the daily quests, and arena only requiring 10 games a week.

item.title: By: Gev
item.dc:creator: Gev
item.description: Uhh, when did you play? All of those were added.
item.content:encoded: Uhh, when did you play? All of those were added.

item.title: By: Random Poster
item.dc:creator: Random Poster
item.description:
I must have missed this one back in the day, but since it's already been necro'd might as well comment on it looking back at what he said one year later.
Still waiting for some of that casual stuff he mentioned aren't we? :D
- Characters follow a new quest line to obtain an armor set
hmmmm nope - The armor sets contain 4 rare and 4 epic pieces
still nope - Some of the pieces can be obtained by soloing (including one of the epic pieces)
nope again - The most difficult pieces to obtain require a UBRS level group
ahahahahaha - We are adding new bosses to existing dungeons
AHAHAHAHAHAHA - Some of the existing dungeons are being re-itemized
And I just died.
item.content:encoded:
I must have missed this one back in the day, but since it’s already been necro’d might as well comment on it looking back at what he said one year later.

Still waiting for some of that casual stuff he mentioned aren’t we? ðŸ˜€

– Characters follow a new quest line to obtain an armor set

hmmmm nope
– The armor sets contain 4 rare and 4 epic pieces

still nope
– Some of the pieces can be obtained by soloing (including one of the epic pieces)

nope again
– The most difficult pieces to obtain require a UBRS level group

ahahahahaha
– We are adding new bosses to existing dungeons

AHAHAHAHAHAHA
– Some of the existing dungeons are being re-itemized

And I just died.

item.title: By: lol

item.description: You're whining about a game. Get a life.
item.content:encoded: You’re whining about a game. Get a life.

item.title: By: Pougen
item.dc:creator: Pougen
item.description:
<blockquote>I hate you tigole, i hope you fucking die, you ruined this game for us, by adding your dumbass little 40 man content...</blockquote>
LOL
Nail. on. the. head.
I can't wait until all the millions of players who are new to MMOs (including me) find that next FUN game (that is right on the horizon), and promptly fuck right off without so much as a look over the shoulder.
Blizzard: Your 16 y/o raid whores will not keep your company afloat, now that you have gotten used to the big money. Casual gamers (a.k.a. players with JOBS and LIVES) are your bread and butter. So best get your asses ready for the time when a true ROLEPLAYING game comes along.
item.content:encoded:
I hate you tigole, i hope you fucking die, you ruined this game for us, by adding your dumbass little 40 man content…

LOL

Nail. on. the. head.

I can’t wait until all the millions of players who are new to MMOs (including me) find that next FUN game (that is right on the horizon), and promptly fuck right off without so much as a look over the shoulder.

Blizzard: Your 16 y/o raid whores will not keep your company afloat, now that you have gotten used to the big money. Casual gamers (a.k.a. players with JOBS and LIVES) are your bread and butter. So best get your asses ready for the time when a true ROLEPLAYING game comes along.

item.title: By: quitter
item.dc:creator: quitter
item.description: Vote with your wallet and quit the game. Burn your copy if you must.
item.content:encoded: Vote with your wallet and quit the game. Burn your copy if you must.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
heh. I know a hardcore pvp horde named Korgath on my server. I hate that bastard ... cuz he's schooled me a few times. I've given him a lesson or two as well, but frankly, it's probably gear wtfpwning him which proves your point amply.
p.s. Tigole isn't Fires of Heaven, that's Furor. Tigole is from another EQ Glory Days guild, but ... same diff.
item.content:encoded:
heh. I know a hardcore pvp horde named Korgath on my server. I hate that bastard … cuz he’s schooled me a few times. I’ve given him a lesson or two as well, but frankly, it’s probably gear wtfpwning him which proves your point amply.

p.s. Tigole isn’t Fires of Heaven, that’s Furor. Tigole is from another EQ Glory Days guild, but … same diff.

item.title: By: kargoth
item.dc:creator: kargoth
item.description: I hate you tigole, i hope you fucking die, you ruined this game for us, by adding your dumbass little 40 man content you have closed off anyone else who wants to pvp or just do pve casually, i myself pvp,hard-fucking-core. and you, you fucking bitch, wont let me have my redone rank 14 items, lets see you get to rank 14 you fat fucking vagina. ITs harder than running a gay little fucking onyxia raid with ur buttplugg homies "fires of heaven" or whatever the fucking shit your gay fucking guil name is you son of a fucking buttplug cunt. I hope you die of fucking aids and ebola you fucking shitface. go fucking die.
